rows.label: qev060302_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm... There must be be something, right?
Some kind of stimulation I can find around here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lulladu what sort of stimulus he's after.

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0020
rows.name: Offer Job

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0021
rows.name: Pass on Troylan's request.

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, I suppose you could say I live to build new
things. New technology makes me...weak in the knees,
you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Your human technology just isn't enough to to satisfy
me. Er, no disrespect intended? It just...isn't?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0004
rows.name:
Some nights, dark thoughts even creep into my head
about whether I might have seen more advanced
technology had we sided with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0005
rows.name:
What? Troylan? A Zaruboggan? He wants to hire me?
And he asked for me by by name? What an honor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0006
rows.name:
Yes yes yes! Let me see what needs fixing!
Quickly now, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0007
rows.name:
So this is a gorkwa, is it? I've seen Zaruboggan
wandering around with them, but never thought I'd
actually lay my my hands on one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0008
rows.name:
What a magnificent form. My curiosity is fit to burst!
Isn't yours? ...No? Er, right then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0009
rows.name:
Just a moment, all right? I need to examine this and
see if I can assess the the damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmm. Unfortunately, the materials I have on hand are
probably not enough to repair it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yes, I'm going to need a hi-spec sensor module and a
hulking incisor first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0012
rows.name:
I hate to trouble you, but do you think you could find
the parts I need?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0013
rows.name:
In the meantime, I will be here playing withâ€”
er, prepping the gorkwa for...repairs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0014
rows.name:
I need a hi-spec sensor module and a hulking incisor
to complete the repairs, if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0015
rows.name:
The sensor you should be able to scavenge off zigs in
Sylvalum. For the incisor, maybe try a potamus over
in Primordia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0016
rows.name:
But there's no need to hurry, okay? The longer you
take, the more time I have to become better acquainted
with this lovely gorkwa, don't I? So so beautiful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh, is my time up? Really? Such a shame.
Let us start these repairs then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yes, those should do nicely.
Just a moment, if that's okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0019
rows.name:
Done! And the more I look at it, the more enchanting
it becomes. Don't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0031
rows.name: Praise the technology of the Zaruboggan.

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0040
rows.name: Flatter

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0041
rows.name: Praise Lulladu's technical skill.

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0020
rows.name:
Er, I was led to to believe that such gorkwa staves
were...not actually Zaruboggan technology?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0021
rows.name:
They are a rather mysterious people, you see,
and what you might call a recent obsession of mine?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh? Thank you. I did it to satisfy my my own curiosity,
but being complimented always feels good, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0023
rows.name:
Do you remember when I said that humans offer little
stimulus earlier? It seems I stand corrected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm very glad you brought this magnificent job my way.
I think you're my...hero?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0025
rows.name:
Ah, but do not let me keep you, all right?
I imagine that Troylan will be waiting for this.
Please return it to him with my regards, if you will?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0026
rows.name:
He said he values it more than his own life, right?
So I suppose you should hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0027
rows.name: Run, human! RUN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0028
rows.name:
The internal structure of the gorkwa was truly
fascinating. Did I mention that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0029
rows.name:
Oh, sorry! Never mind. We probably shouldn't keep
Troylan waiting, should we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0030
rows.name:
Hmm. *fsssh* Lulladu doesn't seem to be here.
...But Chiromyl is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0031
rows.name:
Hello, Troylan. *fsssh* 
Did you need Lulladu for something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0032
rows.name:
I had a question for him about my gorkwa.
Do you know where he is? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0033
rows.name:
Cauldros. *fsssh* He asked where he could find a
whole bunch of voltant, so I sent him there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0034
rows.name: *fsssh* Then he DID take my gorkwa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm not sure whose it was, but he definitely had one
with him, yes. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0036
rows.name:
He was very excited about getting test data on it.
*fsssh* Practically giggling on his way out the door.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0037
rows.name:
So in that short time, he both repaired it AND made a
perfect replica to give me? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0038
rows.name: Why didn't you stop him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0039
rows.name:
*fsssh* Because he said he would give me a giant load
of voltant if I promised to watch the shop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0040
rows.name: You still should have stopped him! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0041
rows.name:
If someone uses a gorkwa without a backpack unit,
the voltant will be absorbed directly into their body![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0042
rows.name:
*fsssh* It would be a huge incident if a Ma-non turned
up dead because of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0043
rows.name:
I assumed it would be fine. He seems like the type to
wear a backpack like us. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0044
rows.name: How could you possibly think that? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0045
rows.name: Cauldros... *fsssh* White Phosphor Lake, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0046
rows.name: Got it on the first guess! *fsssh* Nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0047
rows.name: *fsssh* We can't waste any time here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0048
rows.name:
We have to stop Lulladu, and more importantly,
we have to get my poor gorkwa back! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0049
rows.name: I know you can do it, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0050
rows.name: *fsssh* So much for "we"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0051
rows.name: I had...no idea...devoltanizing was so so...painful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0052
rows.name:
It hurts so bad...I'm starting to to...see things?
G-Grandma...? Is that you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0053
rows.name: What is this I'm feeling...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0054
rows.name: So new, and yet...so awful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0055
rows.name: Oh... Now I'm seeing...[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0050
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0051
rows.name: Take Lulladu to task for lying to you.

rows.label: qev060302_JNK0060
rows.name: Help

rows.label: qev060302_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Lulladu if he is all right.

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0056
rows.name: And [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] looks...very very...angry?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0057
rows.name: C-can't...hear what [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] is saying...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0058
rows.name: It all seems...so so clear...don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0059
rows.name: Lying to Troylan, I mean...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0060
rows.name: Swapping his gorkwa out for a fake was...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0061
rows.name: very very...dumb...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0062
rows.name: Never...again...you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060302_MSG0063
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]
